item.title: Going Dark: Are Technology, Privacy, and Public Safety on a Collision Course?
item.description: Authors: Comey, James Published: October 2014 URL: https://www.fbi.gov/news/speeches/going-dark-are-technology-privacy-and-public-safety-on-a-collision-course Tags: 2010s FBI Going Dark James Comey Public Safety Speech Abstract: FBI Director James Comey’s remarks at the Brookings Institution, Washington, D.C.
